Package ohos.media.sessioncore

Class AVBrowser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.sessioncore.AVBrowser

  • public final class AVBrowser
extends Object
    Browses media data provided by the AVBrowserService.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AVBrowser​(Context context, ElementName name, AVConnectionCallback callback, PacMap options)
      A constructor used to create an AVBrowser instance for media data provided by the media browser service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AVBrowser

        public AVBrowser​(Context context,
                 ElementName name,
                 AVConnectionCallback callback,
                 PacMap options)
        A constructor used to create an AVBrowser instance for media data provided by the media browser service.

        This constructor must be called on main thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        name - Indicates the media item name consisted of the application bundle name and media browser service name.
        callback - Indicates the callback that listens for the service connection status.
        options - Indicates a group of parameters that will be sent to the media browser service. The parameters determine the data returned from the service. This parameter can be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if context, name, or callback is null.
        Since:
        3

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect​()
        Connects to the media browser service.

        This is an asynchronous method. The connection result will be returned through the callback passed to the constructor.

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Throws this exception if any of the following occurs:

        • This AVBrowser has been connected to the service.
        • This AVBrowser is connecting to the service.
        • An unknown exception occurs.
        Since:
        3

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect​()
        Disconnects from the media browser service.

        This is an asynchronous method.

        Since:
        3

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected​()
        Checks whether the media browser service is connected.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the connection is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getElementName

        public ElementName getElementName​()
        Obtains the ElementName instance of the media browser service.
        Returns:
        Returns the ElementName instance if obtained; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getRootMediaId

        public String getRootMediaId​()
        Obtains the ID of the root media item.
        Returns:
        Returns the ID if obtained; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getOptions

        public PacMap getOptions​()
        Obtains the additional media data provided by the media browser service.
        Returns:
        Returns the PacMap instance if obtained; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getAVToken

        public AVToken getAVToken​()
        Obtains the media session token.
        Returns:
        Returns the AVToken instance if obtained; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getAVElement

        public void getAVElement​(String mediaId,
                         AVElementCallback callback)
        Obtains a AVElement instance based on the media item ID. The execution result will be returned through the passed callback.
        Parameters:
        mediaId - Indicates the media item ID.
        callback - Indicates the callback to receive the execution result.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if mediaId or callback is null.
        Since:
        3

      • subscribeByParentMediaId

        public void subscribeByParentMediaId​(String parentMediaId,
                                     AVSubscriptionCallback callback)
        Subscribes to a specified parent media item based on its ID to receive the update notifications about all its child media items.

        If this method is called after the media browser service is connected, this AVBrowser instance will subscribe to all child items of the parent media item.

        If this method is called before the media browser service is connected, this AVBrowser instance will save the parent item ID and passed callback. After the service is connected, this AVBrowser will subscribe to all child items included in the parent media item.

        If a parent media item ID is repeatedly used for subscriptions, the latest subscription will replace the previous one.

        Parameters:
        parentMediaId - Indicates the ID of the parent media item.
        callback - Indicates the callback to receive the subscription result.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if parentMediaId or callback is null.
        Since:
        3

      • subscribeByParentMediaId

        public void subscribeByParentMediaId​(String parentMediaId,
                                     PacMap options,
                                     AVSubscriptionCallback callback)
        Subscribes to a specified parent media item based on its ID and the parameters sent to the media browser service to receive the update notifications about all its child media items.

        If this method is called after the service is connected, this AVBrowser instance will subscribe to all child items of the parent media item.

        If this method is called before the service is connected, this AVBrowser instance will save the parent item ID and passed callback. After the service is connected, this AVBrowser will subscribe to all child items included in the parent media item.

        If a parent media item ID is repeatedly used for subscriptions with the same options parameters, the latest subscription will replace the previous one.

        Parameters:
        parentMediaId - Indicates the ID of the parent media item.
        options - Indicates a group of parameters that will be sent to the service. The parameters determine the data returned from the service.
        callback - Indicates the callback to receive the subscription result.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if parentMediaId, options, or callback is null.
        Since:
        3

      • unsubscribeByParentMediaId

        public void unsubscribeByParentMediaId​(String parentMediaId)
        Unsubscribes from the specified parent media item.
        Parameters:
        parentMediaId - Indicates the ID of the parent media item.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if parentMediaId is null.
        Since:
        3

      • unsubscribeByParentMediaId

        public void unsubscribeByParentMediaId​(String parentMediaId,
                                       AVSubscriptionCallback callback)
        Unsubscribes from the notification of the specified parent media item based on the callback used for the subscription.

        This method cancels only the notification associated with the specified callback, but will not cancel other callbacks even if you have set multiple callbacks for the subscription.

        Parameters:
        parentMediaId - Indicates the ID of the parent media item.
        callback - Indicates the callback based on which the notification will be canceled.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if parentMediaId or callback is null.
        Since:
        3
